mapper.select: select useq, nick, email, pwd from tb_user where nick=#{nick}
select u.nick, b.bseq, b.title, b.datetime, b.hit from tb_user u, tb_board b where u.useq=b.useq order by bseq desc
select u.nick, b.bseq, b.title, b.content, b.datetime, b.hit from tb_user u, tb_board b where u.useq=b.useq and b.bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.update: update tb_board set hit=hit+1 where bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_board(title, content, hit, useq) values(#{title}, #{content}, 0, #{useq})
mapper.update: update tb_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.select: select u.nick, b.bseq, b.title, b.datetime, b.hit from tb_board b, tb_user u where u.useq=b.useq order by bseq desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_attach(fullname, bseq) values(#{fullName}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
mapper.select: select fullname from tb_attach where bseq=#{bseq} order by regdate
mapper.insert: insert into tb_reply(bseq, useq, comment) values(#{bseq}, #{useq}, #{comment})
mapper.select: select r.rseq, r.bseq, r.useq, u.nick, r.comment, r.datetime from tb_reply r, tb_user u where r.useq=u.useq and bseq=#{bseq} and rstatus=0 order by rseq desc
mapper.update: update tb_reply set comment = #{comment}, datetime = now() where rseq=#{rseq}
update tb_reply set rstatus = 1 where rseq=#{rseq}
mapper.select: select count(bseq) from tb_reply where bseq=#{bseq}
